text: The Men's 200 metre breaststroke competition of the 2019 African Games was held on 23 August 2019. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text- align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Anton Chupkov||align=left|||align=left|2:06.12||Gwangju||26 July 2019 |- |African record||align=left|Neil Versfeld||align=left|||align=left|2:09.61||Rome||30 July 2009 |- |Games record||align=left|Sofiane Daid||align=left|||align=left|2:14.27||Algiers||16 July 2007 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nation !! Time !!
